preface.title: Preface
preface.para: A module for helping with developing web applictions.

sect1.title: HTMLCheck
sect1.para: Performs different bad/best practice checks on the generated pages via JavaScript.

sect1.title: JSLint
sect1.para: Examines the code quality of all JavaScript code that is used on the page on the fly (also via JavaScript), using the great tool JSLint.

sect1.title: STDERRLog
sect1.para: every entry contained in STDERR is displayed

sect1.title: TranslationDebug
sect1.para: displays all translation attempts of the current request which failed.

sect1.title: SQLLog
sect1.para: lists all SQL statements of the current request

sect1.title: ConfigLog
sect1.para: lists all ConfigGet requests, indicating their frequency

sect1.title: SessionDump
sect1.para: show the current content of the serverside session

sect1.title: EnvDump
sect1.para: show info about the environment of the layout object
